title: Draw and Save with Pencil Tool
goal: Verify the full drawing cycle: tool selection, color modification, canvas interaction, and export.

steps.expected: Application window is visible, displaying a canvas area and a toolbar

steps.action: Select the Pencil tool in the toolbar
steps.expected: The Pencil tool is selected and highlighted

steps.action: Click the ColorButton and select Red
steps.expected: The active drawing color is updated to Red

steps.action: Draw a stroke on the canvas
steps.expected: A Red stroke appears on the canvas
A file export dialog appears or the drawing is exported successfully
